titleStmt.title: SII 4.510: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 510. (A.R. No. 63 of 1892). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE FOURTH PRAKARA OF THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiripuvanacakkaravarttikaḷ marutaiyum pāṇṭiyaṉRead muṭittalai.muṭin=talaiyuṅ koṇṭaruḷiṉa śrīkolottuṅkacoḻatevaṟku yāṇṭu 18 Āvatu malaimaṇṭalattu muruṇōtta(m)maṅkalattu mātavaṉ Ayiṟkāṭaṉ Aḻakiyamaṇavāḷaperumāḷukku Oru tirunaṉtāviḷak keriyakkaṭavatāka nāḷ Oṉṟukku tiruvaraṅkatevanāl nāḻi ney Erikkakkaṭavatāka Oṭukkina kācu 9 1000
Ikkācu Onpatiṉāyiramum Oṭukki Itu Eriya Oṭikkiṉa veṇkala tirukkuttiviḷakku Oṉṟu Ippaṭi Oṭukku koṇṭom śrī 1A few syllables are lost at the end of this inscription. The following are written in Vaṭṭeḻuttu and Malayāḷam characters above this record:— svasti śiritiripuvaṉacakkaravattikaḷ śrī kulottuṅka coḻa tevarkku yāṇṭu [pa]tiṉeṭṭā • • muruṇotta maṅkalattu mātavaṉayirkkāṭaṉ iṭṭa malaiyāṇ tirukku[tti]viḷakku oṉṟukku • • ruvaraṅ[ka]tevatāṉatti • ya eṟi[k*]kakaṭavi • • • laṅka koṭu • • • • mātavaṉayirkkāṭaṉ.
Digital edition of SII 4.510 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
